original_text: But I would have you know, that the head of every man is Christ; and the head of the woman is the man; and the head of Christ is God.
korean_text: 그러나 나는 너희가 알기를 원하노니 각 남자의 머리는 그리스도요 여자의 머리는 남자요 그리스도의 머리는 하나님이시라

sentences.original_text: But I would have you know
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 너희에게 알리고 싶은 것은

sentences.original_text: that the head of every man is Christ
and the head of the woman is the man
and the head of Christ is God
